overview.title: What to Expect
overview.content: Your journey begins with in-depth dietary recall, symptom mapping, and a review of lab results (glucose, thyroid, hormonal panels, and gut health). We craft structured meal plans with breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack ideas plus mindful eating prompts. Expect grocery lists, kitchen prep videos, and supplement protocols delivered via your private portal.

faq.question: Do you test for food intolerances?
faq.answer: We can organise IgG, stool, or DUTCH testing when clinically appropriate, though we prioritise evidence-based diagnostics.

faq.question: Is this suitable for vegans?
faq.answer: Yes, we create plant-forward menus with mindful supplementation to cover B12, iron, and omega-3 gaps.

faq.question: Can I join if I’m already on medication?
faq.answer: Absolutely. We liaise with your GP or consultant to ensure meal plans complement your prescriptions.
